name: Redesigning a WarCraft Social Network
blurb: The Earthen Ring RP Network is a social network for role-players and writers of WarCraft lore. The site is in need of a new home and needs your help.

rewards.reward: Tier 1: Advocate - Receive exclusive updates about the new site as it is developed. Be among the first to try out the new RP Network with Beta-tester access! All of your content will be imported to the new site for you. You'll receive a unique Advocate 'achievement' badge for your profile (which scales up with each Tier) and special recognition in a list of donors.

Tier 2: Benefactor - You will receive all rewards for Tier 1 (Advocate) and below (the badge scales up by Tier). A special nameplate to make your name stand out on the site. A custom avatar for your character to show off on your profile.

Tier 3: Herald - You will receive all rewards for Tier 2 (Benefactor) and below. Access to a premium area of the new site showcasing upcoming features. Your profile will be featured on the front page.

Tier 4: Patron/Matron - You will receive all rewards for Tier 3 (Herald) and below. You will be able to choose from a number of premium custom designs for your profile. This includes a brief character description or biography and an animated portrait of your character. Your profile will also be featured on the front page of the new site.

Tier 5: Champion - You will receive all rewards for Tier 4 (Patron/Matron) and below for not only your main character, but for one of your Alternate characters as well! Your very own @earthen-ring.com email address!

Tier 6: Crusader - You will receive all rewards for Tier 5 (Champion) and below. A professional drawing (line art bust) of one of your characters from Tsunomi, one of Earthen Ring's own very talented artists!
Tier 7: Highlord - You will receive all rewards for Tier 5 (Champion) and below, . A commissioned digital painting (full color bust) of your character from Tsunomi. One month free game time.

Tier 8: Guardian - You will receive all rewards for Tier 5 (Champion) and below. A premium design for your Guild profile on the new network. This includes a brief introduction and a small group portrait. A short segment to promote your Guild on an upcoming episode of the Hearthstone Tavern RP Podcast! Your Guild will be featured on the Network\u2019s front page.

Tier 9: Aspect - You will receive all rewards for Tier 8 (Guardian) as well as Tier 5 (Champion) and below.  Five additional members of your guild will receive all rewards for Tier 4 (Patron/Matron) and below.

Tier 10: Titan! - You will receive all rewards for Tier 8 (Guardian) as well as Tier 5 (Champion) and below.  TEN additional members of your guild will receive all rewards for Tier 4 (Patron/Matron) and below. A custom designed Guild logo!
